biography.bio: Dagoberto Rodríguez was born in 1916 in Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes, Mexico as Dagoberto Rodríguez Delgado. He was an actor and assistant director, known for El Charro de las Calaveras (1965), El lobo solitario (1952) and Jugándose la vida (1963). He died in 1974 in Mexico City, Mexico.
biography.name: Dagoberto Rodríguez

biography.bio: Daniel 'Chino' Herrera was born on January 3, 1903 in Merida, Yucatan, Mexico as Daniel Herrera Bates. He was an actor, known for Raquel's Shoeshiner (1957), ¡A volar joven! (1947) and El gendarme desconocido (1941). He died on September 29, 1983 in Mexico City, Mexico.
biography.name: Daniel 'Chino' Herrera

biography.bio: Silvia Fournier is an actress, known for El mundo de los vampiros (1961), 'Gatillo Veloz' en 'Los Malditos' (1966) and Mañana serán hombres (1961).
biography.name: Silvia Fournier

biography.bio: Rodolfo Landa was born as Rodolfo Echeverría Álvarez. He was an actor and producer, known for The Criminal Life of Archibaldo de la Cruz (1955), El joven Juárez (1954) and The Third Word (1956). He died on February 14, 2004 in Cuernavaca, Morelos, Mexico.
biography.name: Rodolfo Landa

biography.bio: Sally López is an actress, known for Jugándose la vida (1963).
biography.name: Sally López

biography.bio: Eduardo Suárez is an actor, known for Jugándose la vida (1963), La rebelión de los adolescentes (1959) and Estos años violentos (1962).
biography.name: Eduardo Suárez

biography.bio: Fanny Schiller was born on August 3, 1897 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico as Fanny Schiller Hernández. She was an actress, known for The Black Scorpion (1957), Les abandonnées (1945) and A media luz (1947). She died on September 26, 1971 in Mexico City, Mexico.
biography.name: Fanny Schiller

biography.bio: José Luis Caro is an actor, known for La otra conquista (1998), Feliz año, amor mío (1957) and Rapiña (1975).
biography.name: José Luis Caro

biography.bio: Celia Tejeda is an actress, known for Macario (1960), Ah, Love Is Beautiful (1960) and Cuatro copas (1958).
biography.name: Celia Tejeda

biography.bio: Emily Cranz was born on September 21, 1942 in Tucson, Arizona, USA as Emma Cranz Cantillano. She is an actress, known for Báñame mi amor (1968), Con licencia para matar (1969) and Pasión oculta (1967).
biography.name: Emily Cranz

biography.bio: Mario Cid was born on June 27, 1932 in Tampico, Tamaulipas, Mexico as Mario Chavez Garcia Cid. He is an actor and writer, known for Fuego en el mar (1981), The Rattlesnake (1977) and Operación Cóndor (1989).
biography.name: Mario Cid
